Chords

Guitar chords are formed by combining specific notes played together to create harmony. They are essential for accompanying melodies and creating the foundation of songs. Learning and mastering different chord shapes and progressions opens up a world of possibilities for guitarists to express themselves and create beautiful music.

OPEN CHORD

E Minor

Fingers on second fret of fifth and fourth strings.

Open Chords

D Major

Fingers on the second fret of the third string

Open Chords

C Major

Open position chord, fingers on 2nd and 3rd frets.

Open Chords

G Major

Fingers on third fret, sixth string; open strings.

Open Chords

A minor

Fingers on the first fret of second string (B)

Barre Chords

F sharp Major

This chord is played with barre on the second fret.
